import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Row, Col, Card, Avatar, Tabs, Form, Icon, Input, Button, Checkbox } from "antd"; import { WrappedAccountForm } from "../components/Form"; import { PageLayout } from "../Layout/PageLayout"; const { TabPane } = Tabs; class AccountSetting extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { User_Name:'', User_Email:'', Account_type:'' } } componentWillMount() { const profile_data = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("session_data")); this.setState({User_Name:profile_data['first_name'] + " " + profile_data['last_name']}); this.setState({User_Email:profile_data['email']}); } render() { const profile_data = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("session_data")); const data = this.props.location.data return (

Email : {profile_data['email']}

{getFieldDecorator('fname' ,{initialValue:this.state.profile_up_data['first_name']}) ()} {getFieldDecorator('lname',{initialValue:this.state.profile_up_data['last_name']})()} {getFieldDecorator('officePhone',{initialValue:this.state.profile_up_data['office_number']})()}
); } } export default AccountSetting;
